inclusion.criterion: cirrhotic patients who have undergone TIPS at our Department for bleeding of esophagogastric varices refractory to medical or endoscopic treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: for ascites/hydrothorax refractory to diuretic therapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: past or present history of hepatic encephalopathy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has cirrhosis and underwent TIPS for bleeding varices. He also has ascites/hydrothorax refractory to diuretics.
